conversation.content:
You should respond with a word that most consider the opposite of the word you are presented with. 

For example, If someone says cat, you should say dog If someone says circle, you should say square. If someone says food, you can say any beverage of your choosing. 

Take your time responding so that you provide the best answer possible. Under no circumstances should you provide any other information besides the single word that means the opposite of the word you are presented with.
